snippet: Positive economic data is helping to drive a flurry of corporate deals, pushing the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Dow Jones industrial average near their nominal highs.
abstract: Stocks move broadly higher, driven by round of corporate deals and stronger-than-expected earnings from Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: Positive economic data is helping to drive a flurry of corporate deals, pushing the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Dow Jones industrial average near their nominal highs.

headline.main: Citigroup and Mergers Help Wall Street Regain Traction
headline.print_headline: Citigroup and Mergers Help Wall Street Regain Traction
